document_data.name: Gart Stonenose
document_data.mainbody: '''Gart Stonenose''' was a [[dwarven]] shopkeeper of [[Freedale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The dwarf had only one eye.
document_data.Personality: Gart was very grumpy, except among friends.
document_data.Abilities: He was a capable warrior, but had some difficulties due to the loss of an eye.
document_data.Possessions: As the proprietor of [[Freedale]]'s General Store, he had just about one of everything.
document_data.Activities: He was the owner and shopkeeper of the general store in Freedale. He doubled prices for people he disliked.
document_data.Relationships: He was friends with local [[adventurer]] [[Delvar Ironfist]].
document_data.History: Once an adventurer, Gart had to retire from adventuring after losing an eye. He had since become the shopkeeper for the General Store in Freedale.
